price: Allah, ni Yo Mana Rumenyi-Rudahishwa, Irazi neza ibintu vy’ingirakamaro ku baja bayo; Ironsa uwo Ishaka muri bo ibimubeshaho, Ikanagerera uwo Ishatse muri bo, ni na Yo rero Nyeninguvu, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
